mods.abstract: Audio portion of an episode of the Black Jack Wayne Show from May 14, 1960 on television station KTVU-TV (Oakland, Calif.) Featuring Black Jack Wayne (host, performer), the Maddox Brothers and Rose (performers), Shorty Bacon (performer), Chuck Wayne (performer), Lefty Frizzell (performer), Rockin' Jerry Hill (performer), Fred Lewis (performer), Bill Carter (performer), and Roy Hammer (performer). Show band includes Verne Orr (bass), Fred Lewis (guitar), Sam Davis (guitar), Marty James (fiddle), and Roy Hammer (performer).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
